text: It seems automated feature engineering is a thing. Is <https://www.featuretools.com> a good tool? Does Julia have something for that?

Our Mill.jl was designed for this task with the idea that embedding should be as differentiable as possible.

We have a new feature (still in a branch) supporting general graphs.
